sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.para: This element occurs in the elements copy and move. .

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The element source is used to specify name of the source file when processing a copy, or a move.

sect2.title: Examples
sect2.programlisting: echo Copying 'config.txt into /opt/mypackage/config.txt' cd /usr/src/mypackage cp -f config.txt /opt/mypackage/config.txt
